short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attention prediction - know what your users see as they view you design

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fixate is an automated attention analysis engine for design teams that helps objectively measure the attention-grabbing effectiveness of their visual assets at scale. Fixate analyses any visual content in seconds, automatically giving designers feedback on what is likely to grab the most attention.
